article:
:For airline crash survivor Lisa Rowe, see [[American Airlines Flight 1420]].
For the character Lisa Rowe, see book [[Girl, Interrupted]] or the film
adaptation [[Girl, Interrupted (film)]] where Angelina Jolie plays the character

'Lisa Rowe' is a singer. She released her dance-oriented EP I Am Lisa Rowe in
2012. Singles released include "Black Light" and "Lost in You". She is also
known with her collaborations with a number of artists where she is featured
in their recordings like Virtual Riot ("In Your Hands") and Culture Code
("Over Again").

Her first majour charting release is a collaboration with Danish duo Nik & Jay
called "United" that went in straight to #1 on Tracklisten, the official Danish
Singles Chart.
